description:
These gloves are happy to fly solo on mild days, or layer under insulated gloves on extra-cold adventures. Touchscreen compatible thumb and forefingers let you check your map or snap a pic on the fly.

  • Made of knit polypropylene that provides warmth and wicks moisture
  • Touchscreen compatible inserts on thumbs and forefingers
  • Spandex thread in the cuffs keeps them in place
name: MEC Polypro Liner Gloves - Unisex
